alert.note: Alert for Clay (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 28 at 11:11PM EDT until July 31 at 6:50AM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 AM EDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Kentucky, including the following county, Clay. * WHEN...Until 345 AM EDT. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1110 PM EDT, flooding is occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Manchester, Fall Rock, Sidell, Treadway, Bernice, Burning Springs, Sacker Gap, Littleton, Laurel Creek, Grace, Urban, Mill Pond, Hooker, Herron, Tanksley, Byron, Fogertown, Wild Cat, Benge and Ammie.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
